sentences.en: A prostitute lives off immoral earnings.
A prostitute was soliciting on the street.
sentences.cn: 一名妓女正在街上拉客.

sentences.en: He admitted last week he paid for sex with a prostitute.
sentences.cn: 他承认上星期曾和一名妓女有过性交易。

sentences.en: He thought I was a prostitute and apparently a cheap one.
sentences.cn: 他以为我是Ji.很明显,还是个便宜的.

sentences.en: Higher education is being forced to prostitute itself to market forces.
sentences.cn: 高等教育被迫向市场需求妥协。

sentences.en: Hooter: We should use new name -- prostitute person!
sentences.cn: 我们要用新的名称 —— 妓者!

sentences.en: How shameful he is to prostitute his honour.
sentences.cn: 他出卖自己的荣誉真可耻.

sentences.en: Jiy: She's ain't my girlfriend. She's a prostitute I just picked up.
sentences.cn: 吉米: 她不是我女朋友, 她只是个女,我刚才挑到的.

sentences.en: Key words: In Republic Period; Prostitute system of NanNing; Abnormal phenomenon.
sentences.cn: 关键词: 民国时期; 南宁青楼业; 病态现象.

sentences.en: No Israelite man or woman is to become a shrine prostitute.
sentences.cn: 以色列的女子中不可有妓女. 以色列的男子中不可有娈童.

sentences.en: She became a prostitute in order to pay for her cocaine habit.
Slang To solicit customers. Used of a pimp or prostitute.
sentences.cn: 拉客,拉皮条:拉客. 用于拉皮条的人或妓女.

sentences.en: Sources close to her say that she is working as a prostitute.
sentences.cn: 接近她的消息人士则称她现在是一名妓女.

sentences.en: Therefore , you prostitute, hear the word of the LORD!
sentences.cn: 你这妓女阿, 要听耶和华的话.

sentences.en: When I asked him if he had ever been to a prostitute he said he wouldn't degrade himself like that.
sentences.cn: 我问他是否找过妓女时，他说他不会自贬身份去干那种事情。

sentences.en: Yin Caixia has died. She was a hooker, a prostitute.
sentences.cn: 殷彩霞死了,死前她是一名妓女,更确切的说,她是一名老师.

trans.tran_cn: 卖淫者，妓女，男妓，卖身投靠的人，出卖贞操的人
trans.tran_en: someone, especially a woman, who earns money by having sex with people

trans.tran_cn: 使卖淫，卖身，出卖（名誉等），滥用（能力等），卖淫，卖身
